content: उद्वृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To go upwards, ascend. {@--2@} To fly asunder, burst out; उद्वर्तमानमूलबंधनं <ls>U. 4</ls> the strings of which are giving way or being snapped. {@--3@} To tumble over, fall down. {@--4@} To go out, depart. {@--5@} To rise, swell, increase. {@--6@} To be puffed up with pride, be haughty. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To extirpate, eradicate, destroy; उद्वर्तितं रसांतरेण लज्जालुत्वं <ls>Mv. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To throw up, elevate. {@--3@} To turn round, roll (as eyes). {@--4@} To anoint, smear.
